alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy rainfall will impact portions of Windham, eastern Tolland, Norfolk, Middlesex, eastern Franklin, northwestern Bristol, Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Hampden, central Newport, Bristol, northern Washington, Kent and Providence Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Richmond to New Braintree to near Killingly to near Ledyard Center. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...A fine line of moderate to heavy rain may cause localized flooding due to saturated soils. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Providence, Lowell, Newton, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Framingham, Waltham, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Leominster, Fitchburg, Billerica, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Coventry, Chelmsford and Cumberland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. These storms may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
